statements: UPDATE SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis SET post_content = 'Check out the latest updates!' WHERE stock_ticker = 'AAPL';
UPDATE SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, stock_ticker='AAPL' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaSentimentAnalysis SET post_date = '2021-10-15 15:30:00', post_content='Great news about the company' WHERE stock_ticker='GOOGL';
UPDATE social_media_data SET sentiment_score = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE stock_price_movements SET movement = 'UP' WHERE stock_name = 'AAPL';
UPDATE social_media_data SET text = 'Updated text content' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE stock_price_movements SET movement = 'DECREASE', stock_name = 'AAPL' WHERE timestamp = '2023-01-15 09:30:00'
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.8, sentiment_date = '2023-05-15 12:00:00' WHERE analysis_id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_data SET post_text = 'Updated post text', post_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE post_id = 1234;
UPDATE sentiment_analysis SET sentiment_score = 0.75, sentiment_date = '2022-09-16' WHERE analysis_id = 5678;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET follower_count = 1000 WHERE account_id = 101
UPDATE tweets SET tweet_text = 'Updated tweet text' WHERE tweet_id = 201
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET follower_count = 10000 WHERE account_id = 1
UPDATE tweets SET tweet_text = 'Excited to announce our new product launch!' WHERE tweet_id = 50
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET sentiment_score = 0.75, post_date = '2022-10-20' WHERE post_id = 5678;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = followers_count + 100 WHERE username = 'user123';
UPDATE stock_prices SET price = price * 1.05, volume = volume - 1000 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
